lead.p: fround â€” Returns the nearest single-precision floating-point format of a number.

example.heading: fround example
example.code: console.log(Math.fround(1)); // 1 console.log(Math.fround(1.0)); // 1 console.log(Math.fround(1.2)); // 1.2000000476837158 console.log(Math.fround(1.49)); // 1.4900000095367432 console.log(Math.fround(1.5)); // 1 console.log(Math.fround(1.8)); // 1.7999999523162842 console.log(Math.fround(2)); // 2
